

```{r}
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
anno <- read.csv("../PGS001990/ukb_imp_bct_vars_merged_clean_annotations-NodeNorm.csv")
genes <- read.table("../PGS001990/mapped_genes.txt", col.names = c('gene'))
genes

anno %>%
  dplyr::select(id_x, name) %>%
  dplyr::distinct() %>%
  dplyr::group_by(name) %>%
  dplyr::count() %>%
  dplyr::filter(name != "") %>%
  ggplot(aes(n)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1) +
  xlim(c(0,15))
```


868 mapped genes

```{r}
anno %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% genes$gene)
  dplyr::select(id_x, name) %>%
  dplyr::distinct() %>%
  dplyr::group_by(id_x) %>% 
  dplyr::count() %>%
  dplyr::filter(n > 1) %>%
  dplyr::arrange(desc(n))
  ggplot(aes(n)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1) 
  xlim(c(0,25))
```

20,930 variants map to >1 genes
